/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene and creating a lens flare in the top left corner of the image. In the distance, buildings can be seen, adding an urban touch to the otherwise natural landscape. The image is captured in 360 degrees, providing a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings.
